pages.title: Color Chart
pages.text: The <item>Color Chart/$ keeps track of all <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)alignments/$ the player has discovered with an <item>$(l:crossroads:intro/omnimeter)omnimeter/$.$(br2)It has a UI with a color wheel, where any color associated with an undiscovered <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)alignment/$ will be grayed out. It also has a search bar where you can search an <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)alignment
<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)/$ to show all the colors that create that <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)alignment/$.$(br2)
